benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Modify custom fields to payment

covered: Valid Request: The suite includes multiple scenarios that perform successful PUT /customFields operations (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC17) with 204 responses and DB updates.
Non-Existing Resource: TC06 validates 404 when paymentId not found.
Invalid PaymentId Format: TC05 validates 400 for an invalid UUID format.
Missing Required Headers: TC07 validates 400 when X-Killbill-CreatedBy header is missing.
Unauthorized Access: TC11 validates 401 for missing/invalid authentication tokens.
Missing or Malformed Body/Validation: TC08 (missing body), TC09 (malformed JSON), TC10 (invalid field data) and TC13 (injection) cover payload validation and input validation errors.
Server Error Handling: TC12 covers 500 responses when the database or dependencies fail.
Header Optionality: TC02 demonstrates handling when optional headers are provided (e.g., X-Killbill-Reason, X-Killbill-Comment).
Empty Payload Edge Case: TC04 covers empty custom fields array resulting in removal/no-op.
Large Payloads and Performance: TC14/TC20 cover large payloads and performance constraints.
Edge Cases: TC15 (maximum length fields), TC16 (extra unexpected properties), and TC18 (duplicate field names).
Integration/End-to-End: TC17 ensures subsequent GET returns updated data.
Concurrency: TC19 tests multiple concurrent PUT requests.
Security: TC13 tests SQL injection attempts in field values.
gaps: Partial Update: There is no test that validates behavior when attempting a partial update (only some fields).
Authorization: Forbidden (403) scenario not covered; tests only cover 401.
Rate Limiting: No tests for throttling or rate limiting.
Caching Behavior: No tests validating caching headers (e.g., ETag, Cache-Control).
recommendations: Add a test for 403 Forbidden to cover insufficient permissions scenarios.
Add rate limiting/throttling tests for PUT requests.
Add caching headers validation to ensure proper caching semantics (ETag, Cache-Control).
Add a Partial Update test to ensure server rejects or handles partial updates as per policy.
